sentences.en: A ridge of high pressure is building up strongly over the Atlantic.
sentences.cn: 一个强大的高压脊正在大西洋上空形成。

sentences.en: At no time did I feel rushed or under pressure.
sentences.cn: 我任何时候都不会觉得仓促或者有压力。

sentences.en: He is being constantly monitored with regular checks on his blood pressure.
sentences.cn: 他被实时监测，定时量血压。

sentences.en: He will never pressure you to get married.
sentences.cn: 他永远也不会给你施加压力让你结婚。

sentences.en: He'd taken her pulse and made a guess at her blood pressure.
sentences.cn: 他给她把过脉，估量了她的血压。

sentences.en: In an electric power plant the heat converts water into high-pressure steam.
sentences.cn: 在发电厂里，热能将水转化成高压蒸汽。

sentences.en: Must you always run when the pressure gets too much?
sentences.cn: 难道压力一大你就非要逃开吗？

sentences.en: Pressure appears to be mounting for conformity in how people speak English.
sentences.cn: 要求人们讲规范英语的压力似乎越来越大。

sentences.en: She suggests that women are under constant pressure to be abnormally thin.
sentences.cn: 她暗示说女性总是处在保持身材异常瘦削的压力之下。

sentences.en: The built-in safety device compensates for a fall in water pressure.
sentences.cn: 该内置式安全装置在水压下降时能提供保护。

sentences.en: The pressure began to tell as rain closed in after 20 laps.
sentences.cn: 跑完20圈以后，眼看就要下雨了，大家开始紧张起来。

sentences.en: the pressure of his hand on my arm
sentences.cn: 他的手压在我胳膊上的力量

sentences.en: The pressures of work can make you ill.
sentences.cn: 工作压力可能会导致生病。

sentences.en: The Prime Minister has caved in to backbench pressure.
sentences.cn: 首相迫于后座议员们的压力让步了。

sentences.en: The right thing would be to apply direct pressure to the wound.
sentences.cn: 正确的做法是直接按住伤口。

sentences.en: The trough of low pressure extended over about 1000 kilometres.
sentences.cn: 低压槽延伸约1,000公里。

sentences.en: They are putting pressure on people to vote yes.
sentences.cn: 他们正在向民众施加压力，要求他们投赞成票。

sentences.en: They felt this would put intolerable pressure on them.
sentences.cn: 他们觉得这会给他们带来无法承受的压力。

sentences.en: They took my pulse, took my blood pressure, and X-rayed my jaw.
sentences.cn: 他们给我量了脉搏、血压，还给我的下颌拍了X光片。

sentences.en: You must never give in to pressure .
sentences.cn: 你绝不能屈从压力。

sentences.en: You overlook the pressure you're under and what it does to you.
sentences.cn: 你忽视了你所承受的压力及它带给你的后果。

words.tran_cn: 加压的；有使血压增高的；收缩血管的
压；按；新闻；出版社；[印刷] 印刷机
增压；密封；使…加压（pressurize的过去式）
密封；增压；使……加压，使……压入

phrases.tran_cn: 气压；气体压力；煤气压力
压力差；差压；压力补偿器；气压梯度
面临压力，在压力之下；受到压力

trans.tran_en: an attempt to persuade someone by using influence, arguments, or threats
to try to make someone do something by making them feel it is their duty to do it

trans.tran_cn: 对…施加压力； 迫使， 说服
trans.tran_en: to try to make someone do something by making them feel it is their duty to do it
